text: logon ne to kah diya ki khuda ne beta bana liya-ye mahaz lagon vah tamaam nakaayas se paak va paakeeza vah (har tarah) se beparavaah hain va jo kuchh aasamaanon mein hai aur jo kuchh zameen mein hai (sab) usee ka hai (jo kuchh) tum kahate ho( usakee koee daleel to tumhaare paas hai nahin kya tum khuda par) (yoo hee) be jaane boojhe jhooth bola karate ho
